name: delivery_id
description: Unique identifier for the delivery location

name: remaining_distance_km
description: Remaining distance to the delivery location in kilometers

name: estimated_time_min
description: Estimated time to delivery in minutes

name: delivery_difficulty
description: Delivery difficulty of the delivery location

name: created_at
description: Timestamp when the delivery location was created.

name: updated_at
description: Timestamp when the delivery was last updated.
